notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: P.J. Duignan conceived the outline for the review, drafted the document, figures and table, and invited contributions from scientists unable to attend the workshop. M.F. Van Bressem reviewed each draft, contributed to writing the diagnostics and epidemiology sections, and constructed Figure 4. W.P. Duprex constructed Figure 1, the phylogenetic tree and contributed to the molecular virology section; F. Gulland, J. Baker and M. Barbieri wrote the Hawaiian monk seal vaccination section and reviewed the entire manuscript; S. De Guise, S. Goodman, T. Goldstein, O. Nielsen, J. Wellehan, U. Siebert, K. Colegrove, J.T. Saliki and D. Rotstein contributed to the sections on immune response, pathogenesis and diagnostics and reviewed the manuscript; A. Hall, S. Goodman, D. Fauquier, G. Early, K. Matassa and T.K. Rowles contributed to the epidemiology section and reviewed drafts; K. Lamy produced Figure 3 and assisted with epidemiology; G. Di Guardo, B. Jensen, S. Mazzariol, T. Waltzek reviewed the manuscript. K. Groch formatted the manuscript and literature and reviewed drafts of the manuscript. B. Grenfell, A. Dobson and S.E. Morris participated to the workshop and made constructive comments on epidemiology. The RAPIDD workshop was organized and hosted by F. Gulland, B. Grenfell, T.K. Rowles and A. Dobson. R.L. De Swart contributed to the cell receptors and pathogenesis sections and reviewed the entire manuscript.
